meanings.definition: A website containing a writer's or group of writers' own experiences, observations, opinions, etc.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys reading blogs about travel and food.
meanings.sent2: I visit different blogs to learn new things.
meanings.sent3: The blogs about funny cat videos always make me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a library of blogs, each one a unique story.
meanings.sent5: The blogs were like windows into people's lives.

meanings.definition: To write or maintain a blog.
meanings.sent1: He blogs about his daily adventures.
meanings.sent2: She blogs regularly about fashion trends.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally blogged about my cooking disaster.
meanings.sent4: His words blogged across the screen, captivating the readers.
meanings.sent5: Blogging allows me to share my thoughts with the world.
